```{r load packages}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(xlsx)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r loadfile-de}
pers_de <- read_excel(
        "../Data/Pers.xlsx",
        sheet = 1,
        col_names = TRUE,
        col_types = NULL,
        na = "",
        skip = 0
        )
set.seed(123)
pers_de_sample <- sample_n(pers_de, 115)
saveRDS(pers_de, file = "../Data/pers_de.rds")
write.xlsx(x = pers_de_sample, file = "../Data/pers_sample.xlsx",
           sheetName = "DE", col.names = TRUE, showNA = TRUE, append = TRUE)
```
